FuncDef: This command binds a service to an existing Service Distribution Point (SDP).

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the SDP identifier. Allowed values are integers in the range of 1 and 17407 for existing SDPs.
Specifies the virtual circuit identifier. Values-1 to 4294967295.

Specifies the encapsulation and pseudowire type for the spoke SDP. Values-ether: specifies Ethernet pseudowire as the type of virtual circuit (VC) associated with the SDP binding. ParamDefault: Default- ether
Keyword used to create the spoke SDP. The create keyword requirement can be enabled or disabled in the environment>create context.
